typography.font_family: System default (SF Pro on iOS, Roboto on Android)
typography.heading: 20px semibold
typography.caption: 13px regular

steps: Keyboard appears immediately with cursor in text field
Task appears in list, text field clears for next task
user_flows.error_handling: If text empty, gentle shake animation on Add button

steps: User swipes right on task row
Task animates with checkmark and green highlight
Task fades out and moves to completed section
user_flows.error_handling: Accidental swipes can be undone with shake to undo

wireframes.description: Clean, minimal task list with add functionality

layout.header: Simple app title, no navigation elements
layout.add_section: Large text input field with 'Add Task' placeholder
layout.task_list: Clean list of tasks, each row with swipe zone

interaction_patterns.description: Immediate keyboard activation on app open
interaction_patterns.implementation: Auto-focus text input with keyboard animation
interaction_patterns.accessibility: VoiceOver announces 'Add task field, text field' on focus

interaction_patterns.description: Right swipe gesture marks tasks complete
interaction_patterns.implementation: Swipe threshold of 40% screen width, haptic at 60%
interaction_patterns.accessibility: Double-tap alternative for users unable to swipe

interaction_patterns.description: Completed tasks gracefully fade and move to archive

accessibility_compliance.wcag_aa: Large touch targets (44pt minimum), high contrast text (4.5:1 ratio)
accessibility_compliance.voiceover_support: Full task list navigation, completion confirmation
accessibility_compliance.motor_accessibility: Swipe alternatives via double-tap, adjustable gesture sensitivity

platform_guidelines.ios_hig: Native iOS gestures, SF Pro typography, iOS-standard spacing
platform_guidelines.material_design: Android gesture patterns, Roboto typography, Material elevation

standards_compliance.responsive_design: Adapts to device sizes from iPhone SE to iPad, maintains usability
standards_compliance.dark_mode_support: Automatic dark mode with high contrast text and inverted colors
